page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SkipToAlphaNum as l()

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: True if an alphanumeric character was found.

page.description: Skip until a alphanumeric character is encountered. Return true if successful.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.SkipToAlphaNum() function moves the offset to the next alphanumeric character. The offset does not move if it is already pointing to a alphanumeric character.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) scanner.scanover(4) ? scanner.SkipToAlphaNum() = .T. ? scanner.GetToOffset() = "This " ? scanner.getremainder() = is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note.
